Sept. 8, 1940 D Ashington Contest
Ashington Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
ashington-contest
None
Other
The Ballroom, Ashington, Northumberland, England, UK Each band to play 12 minutes of own song selection, and restricted to 16 players. No prize money but medals for best cornet, trombone and horn to Newbiggin. Best soprano to North Seaton, best flugal to Netherton. Promoted to raise money for War Funds. 6 bands competed.
Nov. 26, 2013, 1:23 p.m. Jan. 28, 2019, 11:24 a.m.
